name: Arena of Judgement
description:
An arena based strategy game where you must use monsters to beat an opponent in a 3v3 battle. Position your monsters behind cover, attack your opponent and strategize your way to victory!

Gameplay:

The gameplay consists of controlling units with your mouse to attack enemies.

Controls:

Play with simplistic controls, using only your mouse for main functions.

Developers: Artist:

Roxanne Visser
